channel.title: Make an object have a lvl req before teleporting
channel.description: how would i make an object only teleport you somewhere when you have an agility level of 50? for 317 pi

item.title: Make an object have a lvl req before teleporting
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Just a simple statement like if (p.getlevel(23) >= 50){
p.tele(xxxx, yyyy)
}else{
p.sm(“You need an agility level of 50 to teleport here”);
}

Thats what it would be like for a 562 so chaneg yours to like player.sendmessage or what ever your base does but that’s the main idea of it
just have to use an if statement. Hope it helped a bit… Hope you know a little about java to be able to write it…

Read full topic
item.source: Make an object have a lvl req before teleporting
